languages.text: "Вряд ли можно рассчитывать на описание стратегической и политической схемы действий культа". {n}Хейнрикс мрачно хмыкает.{/n} "Пророчества Хаоса редко бывают однозначными и ясными. Тем, что смогут расшифровать кодифицеры, займутся мистики. Возможно, они заплатят за свою службу жизнью, но таков удел всех, кто рискует душой в борьбе с {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврагом{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Вряд ли можно рассчитывать на описание стратегической и политической схемы действий Культа". {n}Хейнрикс мрачно хмыкает.{/n} "Пророчества Хаоса редко бывают однозначными и ясными. Тем, что смогут расшифровать кодифицеры, займутся мистики. Возможно, они заплатят за свою службу жизнью, но таков удел всех, кто рискует душой в борьбе с {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврагом{/g}".

languages.text: "I suppose it's too much to hope for a detailed account of the cult's strategic and political plans." {n}Heinrix scoffs dourly.{/n} "Prophecies of Chaos are rarely unequivocal and clear. The mystics will work with whatever the codifiers manage to decrypt. Perhaps they will pay for their service with their lives, but such is the lot of those who risk their souls in the struggle against the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Вряд ли можно рассчитывать на описание стратегической и политической схемы действий культа". {n}Хейнрикс мрачно хмыкает.{/n} "Пророчества Хаоса редко бывают однозначными и ясными. Тем, что смогут расшифровать кодифицеры, займутся мистики. Возможно, они заплатят за свою службу жизнью, но таков удел всех, кто рискует душой в борьбе с {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврагом{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "I suppose it's too much to hope for a detailed account of the Cult's strategic and political plans." {n}Heinrix scoffs dourly.{/n} "Prophecies of Chaos are rarely unequivocal and clear. The mystics will work with whatever the codifiers manage to decrypt. Perhaps they will pay for their service with their lives, but such is the lot of those who risk their souls in the struggle against the Archenemy."

"I suppose it's too much to hope for a detailed account of the Cult's strategic and political plans." {n}Heinrix scoffs dourly.{/n} "Prophecies of Chaos are rarely unequivocal and clear. The mystics will work with whatever the codifiers manage to decrypt. Perhaps they will pay for their service with their lives, but such is the lot of those who risk their souls in the struggle against the Archenemy."

The mystics will work with whatever the codifiers manage to decrypt. Perhaps they will pay for their service with their lives, but such is the lot of those who risk their souls in the struggle against the Archenemy."

"I suppose it's too much to hope for a detailed account of the Cult's strategic and political plans." {n}Heinrix scoffs dourly.{/n} "Prophecies of Chaos are rarely unequivocal and clear. The mystics will work with whatever the codifiers manage to decrypt. Perhaps they will pay for their service with their lives, but such is the lot of those who risk their souls in the struggle against the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}."

"I suppose it's too much to hope for a detailed account of the Cult's strategic and political plans." {n}Heinrix scoffs dourly.{/n} "Prophecies of Chaos are rarely unequivocal and clear. The mystics will work with whatever the codifiers manage to decrypt. Perhaps they will pay for their service with their lives, but such is the lot of those who risk their souls in the struggle against the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}."

languages.text: “我希望能得知那个邪教详细的战略目标与计划，但这恐怕不太现实。”{n}海因里希闷闷不乐地自嘲道。{/n}“几乎所有来自混沌的预言，都是含糊不清、意义不明的。我们的神秘学者会尽他们所能进行解密。或许这么做会让他们付出生命的代价，但他们甘愿冒着灵魂的危险，与{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}进行斗争，这就是他们的命运。”
languages.original_text: "I suppose it's too much to hope for a detailed account of the cult's strategic and political plans." {n}Heinrix scoffs dourly.{/n} "Prophecies of Chaos are rarely unequivocal and clear. The mystics will work with whatever the codifiers manage to decrypt. Perhaps they will pay for their service with their lives, but such is the lot of those who risk their souls in the struggle against the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “我希望能得知那个邪教详细的战略目标与计划，但这恐怕不太现实。”{n}海因里希闷闷不乐地自嘲道。{/n}“几乎所有来自混沌的预言，都是含糊不清、意义不明的。我们的神秘学者会尽他们所能进行解密。或许这么做会让他们付出生命的代价，但他们甘愿冒着灵魂的危险，与{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}进行斗争，这就是他们的命运。”

languages.text: «Supongo que un resumen detallado de los planes políticos y estratégicos del Culto sería mucho pedir». {n}Heinrix ríe lúgubre.{/n} «Las profecías del Caos no suelen destacar por su claridad ni su fiabilidad. Los místicos trabajarán con lo que los codificadores puedan descifrar. Tal vez den su vida durante el cumplimiento del deber, pero es el riesgo que corren todos los que se enfrentan al {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}».
languages.original_text: "I suppose it's too much to hope for a detailed account of the cult's strategic and political plans." {n}Heinrix scoffs dourly.{/n} "Prophecies of Chaos are rarely unequivocal and clear. The mystics will work with whatever the codifiers manage to decrypt. Perhaps they will pay for their service with their lives, but such is the lot of those who risk their souls in the struggle against the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «Supongo que un resumen detallado de los planes políticos y estratégicos del Culto sería mucho pedir». {n}Heinrix ríe lúgubre.{/n} «Las profecías del Caos no suelen destacar por su claridad ni su fiabilidad. Los místicos trabajarán con lo que los codificadores puedan descifrar. Tal vez den su vida durante el cumplimiento del deber, pero es el riesgo que corren todos los que se enfrentan al {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}».

languages.text: 「教団の戦略的、政治的計画の詳細な説明を期待するのは無理な話だと思います」{n}ハインリックスは気難しげに笑う。{/n}「渾沌の予言が明確であるのは稀なことです。神秘主義者たちは、解読者たちが解読できたものが何であれ使うことでしょう。おそらく、生命をかけることになるでしょうが、それが{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}との戦いに魂を賭けるものの宿命なのです」
languages.original_text: "I suppose it's too much to hope for a detailed account of the cult's strategic and political plans." {n}Heinrix scoffs dourly.{/n} "Prophecies of Chaos are rarely unequivocal and clear. The mystics will work with whatever the codifiers manage to decrypt. Perhaps they will pay for their service with their lives, but such is the lot of those who risk their souls in the struggle against the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「教団の戦略的、政治的計画の詳細な説明を期待するのは無理な話だと思います」{n}ハインリックスは気難しげに笑う。{/n}「渾沌の予言が明確であるのは稀なことです。神秘主義者たちは、解読者たちが解読できたものが何であれ使うことでしょう。おそらく、生命をかけることになるでしょうが、それが{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}との戦いに魂を賭けるものの宿命なのです」

languages.text: "Eine detaillierte Liste der strategischen und politischen Pläne des Kults wäre wahrscheinlich zu viel erhofft", {n}spöttelt Heinrix mürrisch.{/n} "Die Prophezeiungen des Chaos sind nur selten eindeutig und klar. Die Mystiker werden mit dem arbeiten müssen, was die Codifier entschlüsseln können. Vielleicht müssen sie für ihre Dienste mit dem Leben bezahlen, aber das ist eben das Los aller, die ihre Seele im Kampf gegen den {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeind{/g} aufs Spiel setzen."
languages.original_text: "I suppose it's too much to hope for a detailed account of the cult's strategic and political plans." {n}Heinrix scoffs dourly.{/n} "Prophecies of Chaos are rarely unequivocal and clear. The mystics will work with whatever the codifiers manage to decrypt. Perhaps they will pay for their service with their lives, but such is the lot of those who risk their souls in the struggle against the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Eine detaillierte Liste der strategischen und politischen Pläne des Kults wäre wahrscheinlich zu viel erhofft", {n}spöttelt Heinrix mürrisch.{/n} "Die Prophezeiungen des Chaos sind nur selten eindeutig und klar. Die Mystiker werden mit dem arbeiten müssen, was die Codifier entschlüsseln können. Vielleicht müssen sie für ihre Dienste mit dem Leben bezahlen, aber das ist eben das Los aller, die ihre Seele im Kampf gegen den {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeind{/g} aufs Spiel setzen."

languages.text: « J'imagine qu'un compte rendu détaillé des plans stratégiques et politiques du Culte serait trop demander, {n}répond Heinrix sur un ton moqueur.{/n} Les prophéties du Chaos sont rarement explicites. Les mystiques devront se contenter de ce que les codifieurs parviendront à déchiffrer. Cette mission leur coûtera peut-être la vie, mais tel est le sort de ceux qui risquent leur âme dans la lutte contre le {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "I suppose it's too much to hope for a detailed account of the cult's strategic and political plans." {n}Heinrix scoffs dourly.{/n} "Prophecies of Chaos are rarely unequivocal and clear. The mystics will work with whatever the codifiers manage to decrypt. Perhaps they will pay for their service with their lives, but such is the lot of those who risk their souls in the struggle against the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « J'imagine qu'un compte rendu détaillé des plans stratégiques et politiques du Culte serait trop demander, {n}répond Heinrix sur un ton moqueur.{/n} Les prophéties du Chaos sont rarement explicites. Les mystiques devront se contenter de ce que les codifieurs parviendront à déchiffrer. Cette mission leur coûtera peut-être la vie, mais tel est le sort de ceux qui risquent leur âme dans la lutte contre le {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}. »

languages.text: "Tarikatın stratejik ve siyasi planlarıyla ilgili ayrıntılar beklemek fazla iyimser olur sanıyorum." {n}Heinrix, alaycı bir tutumla konuşuyor.{/n} "Kaos kehanetlerinin açık ve anlaşılır olduğu nadir görülür. Gizemcilerimiz, kodlayıcıların deşifre edebildiği kadarıyla çalışmak durumunda kalacak. Belki de hizmetleri için can verecekler fakat bu, {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'na{/g} karşı mücadele etmek adına ruhunu ortaya koyanların kaderidir."
languages.original_text: "I suppose it's too much to hope for a detailed account of the cult's strategic and political plans." {n}Heinrix scoffs dourly.{/n} "Prophecies of Chaos are rarely unequivocal and clear. The mystics will work with whatever the codifiers manage to decrypt. Perhaps they will pay for their service with their lives, but such is the lot of those who risk their souls in the struggle against the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Tarikatın stratejik ve siyasi planlarıyla ilgili ayrıntılar beklemek fazla iyimser olur sanıyorum." {n}Heinrix, alaycı bir tutumla konuşuyor.{/n} "Kaos kehanetlerinin açık ve anlaşılır olduğu nadir görülür. Gizemcilerimiz, kodlayıcıların deşifre edebildiği kadarıyla çalışmak durumunda kalacak. Belki de hizmetleri için can verecekler fakat bu, {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'na{/g} karşı mücadele etmek adına ruhunu ortaya koyanların kaderidir."
